title: Woz Blog: Encouraging signs for Raptors against Nuggets including Ibaka, Siakam
text: This was a return to form for Serge Ibaka, who had an amazing game. He has been putting in extra work with his jumper, but he most impressed on the boards in this one, fighting harder than usual (after being encouraged to do so previously by Dwane Casey) and really mixing it up.
